parameters: <center>Welcome to the playtester build of Slumberer's Universe Demo!\!
This version may differ from the upcoming public release.\!
You will also be asked to fill a survey at the end of this demo.</center>
\LSOFF It was all because of you.
\LSOFF Do you remember the car accident?
\LSOFF Why... \!Why did you just stand there..?
\LSOFF You were slumbering back then, too.
WARNING: This action will NOT save your progress! Everything
since last save will be lost.\! Do you want to exit?
Text = You don't want to attack.
<center>We've made a survey for the playtesters of this game.\!
This is for getting feedback for the demo, so we can improve
the game in the future releases.</center>
<center>We hope that you do not ignore this. \!We do not log email
or any other information (you can optionally enter your name).
It is made using Google Forms.</center>
<center>Would you like to fill the survey?</center>
<center>The survey has been opened in your web browser.\!
If, however, nothing happened, you can enter this URL:
Jos, kuitenkaan, mitään ei tapahtunut, voit syöttää tämän URL:n:
<center>Okay. Thanks for playing the game, though!</center>

parameters.text:
<center>\FS[40]WARNING!

\FS[30]If you're trying to load a game from a previous version of the
game (before April 2023), the game will be broken. Due to the amount
of changes made, the saves from the older versions aren't compatible.

You can revert back to the older version by selecting the beta 1.0.1
from Steam (right click Slumberer's Universe --> properties --> betas)
or by downloading the older version from Itch or Gamejolt.</center>

parameters: Do you really want to quit?
